Detailed Description

Structure to hold a vector contain two values.

Used to define interaction in 2D

const Vector2 & chain::Vector2::Truncate ( const Real  s  ) 

Truncate this vector.

similar to Scale(), but only scales vector to s if it's length is greater than s
